statements: DELETE FROM efficiency_data WHERE equipment_id = '1' AND date_recorded = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM equipment_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Industries';
DELETE FROM equipment_details WHERE equipment_id = 123 AND manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM gasification_equipment_performance WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND efficiency < 0.75;
DELETE FROM EquipmentLogs WHERE log_date < '2022-01-01' AND equipment_id = 3;
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND technician = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM gasification_equipment_performance WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND efficiency_rating < 0.7;
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
